text: DEUS fulfilled His promise VOS VOS defeated them His sinister Tunc vos wavered disputed yourselves disobeyed post He shown vos (victory) vos longed pro! Tunc some de vos became distracted spoils hoc saeculum dum others rightly de Hereafter He tunc diverted vos them test vos! He pardoned vos. DEUS showers believers His GRATIA
